articles.title: Erin Patterson tells murder trial exotic mushrooms 'have more flavour' - BBC
articles.description: Australian woman Erin Patterson denies murdering three relatives and seriously injuring another by serving death cap mushrooms.
articles.content:
While we wait for the jury to come back from their lunch break, here's a reminder of the allegations at the centre of the case.
The jury is being asked to weigh up evidence and decide whether Erin P… [+846 chars]
